channel.title: Webclient
channel.description:
I tried to create a webclient with Deltascape v17 but I always get "Client updated - reload client" then it jumps to "Error trying again in - *number*"
I think it's the extracting part, I followed this tutorial perfectly. I don't know what i've done.
If you have any suggestions help me please.
Many thanks in advanced.

item.title: Webclient
item.dc:creator: @warlok warlok
item.description:
@warlok wrote:

Explain exactly how you:
Made and zipped your cache file
Added the cache downloader to the client
Jarred

Also, you may have forgotten to change the code from the tutorial when updating to download your cache, as it requires you to change the link to the cache.

Read full topic

item.description:
@vamp256 wrote:

Did you have direct download link for you cache?

Read full topic

item.description:
@sergiypro wrote:

i get the same error… what kind of cache do u use? is the Sprites folder inside ur cache? cuz the tutorial ususes a client where the cache has Sprites folder inside it
